cu.explanation_en: Setting the DRB ciphering to an invalid enum 'invalid' will cause ciphering configuration errors and may prevent proper data encryption.

du.explanation_en: Setting the RRC log level to an invalid enum 'invalid' will cause logging configuration errors and may prevent proper RRC layer logging.
du.explanation_zh: 將 RRC 日誌等級設定為無效的枚舉值 'invalid'，會導致日誌配置錯誤，並可能阻止正確的 RRC 層日誌。
